questions.title: 汤姆花了整整500万美元买他的法拉利。
questions.answer: Tom spent exactly 5 million dollars on his Ferrari.

questions.title: 这棵树足足有100米高。
questions.answer: The height of this tall tree is 100 clear meters.

questions.title: 我花了整整一个月的时间完成这个艰巨的任务。
questions.answer: It takes me one cleanly month to finish this difficult task.

questions.title: 它花了我整整三天时间。
questions.answer: It takes me three clear days.

questions.title: 火车八点钟准时到达。
questions.answer: The train arrived at exactly 8 o'clock.

title: ——你看见玛丽了吗？她早晨悄悄地离开了。
——我不知道啊，我起来时，已经整整9点了。

answer.en: Did you see Mary, she has left stealthily this morning.
I don't know. When I woke up it has been just 9 o'clock.

title: ——你为什么看上去这么开心啊？
——因为下个星期天我就整整18岁了。
——你将是成年人了。

answer.en: Why do you look so happy?
Because I shall be clear eighteen years old next Sunday.

title: ——我好累，我用了10个小时坐飞机。
——快去睡觉。

answer.en: I'm very tired. It took me clear ten hours to fly in the sky.
